root.name: Raid Over Moscow
root.description: Â Raid Over Moscow takes place over several small stages and has you trying to stop a Russian missile launch. The first couple of stages have you departing a space station and successfully piloting a lander craft out of the space station. The next stage is a sideways on Zaxxon like stage where you are flying towards Moscow. The fourth stage involves attacking the silos and command center in order to stop the missile launch. Once this is done the final attack on Moscow takes place where you need to attack tanks, soldiers and what looks like the Kremlin in order to destroy the reactor contained within.
